import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' const Profile = props => { const makeNumOption =(start, end) =>{ const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear() const options =[] for (let i= (start); i <= (end); i++){ options.push() } return options } const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ contry:'', city:'', street:'', day:'', month:'', year:'', images:'', youtube:'', facbook:'', instagram:'' }) const [displaySocial, toggleSocial] = useState(false) const { adopting, petOwner, selling, company, location, favePet, images, youtube, facbook, instagram } = formData const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.name}) return (

)} Profile.propTypes = { } export default Profile
